TextBody:
Dear Shaun,

As I did not understood from your last email if we have your permission to access the SSH, I will explain once again:

- Your Endpoint Protector server is currently hosted by us on AWS
- In order to gain access to the SSH we need your written permission to do it so that we can investigate the reason for which you received the error mentioned below:
Warning: mkdir() [function.mkdir]: No space left on device in /var/www/EPPServer/lib/cache/sfFileCache.class.php on line 482

Looking forward for your acceptance for SSH access for the EPP support team.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CsUIL:ref

Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #414592 - Hosted EPP Appliance Down
